name: Be Structured Technology Group, Inc.
tagline: Be Structured: We're Your IT Department
description:
Be Structured Technology Group, Inc. is a leading managed services IT provider in the Los Angeles Metro and Orange County areas. 
We partner with small businesses and non-profits by assuming the full responsibility of an IT department. 
We provide proactive solutions, expert help, responsive service, and a CTO/CIO at half the cost of a full-time IT staff person.
